devdoc.details: Anyone can register an agent, set pricing, and manage lifecycle

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params.limit: Maximum number of agents to return
Maximum number of agents to return

returns._totalEarnings: Total MNEE earned across all agents

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.metadataURI: URI pointing to agent metadata JSON
params.pricePerCall: Price per service call in MNEE (wei)

returns.agentId: The ID of the newly registered agent

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.agentId: ID of the agent to update
params.metadataURI: New metadata URI (empty to keep unchanged)
params.newPrice: New price per call (0 to keep unchanged)

devdoc.title: AgentRegistry

incrementAgentStats(uint256,uint256).notice: Increment agent stats after job completion (called by Router)

setRouter(address).notice: Set the router address (can only be set once or by owner)
